roleset.name: get rid of
roleset.note: UNLOAD-V NOTES: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls wipe_manner-10.4.1. No comparison. (from unload.01-v)

role.descr: agent, entity getting rid of something
instrument or manner, if separate from agent

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: So far, Mr. Paul has unloaded but three of his masterpieces, he won't say to whom.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: [The thrift]-1 is also working *trace*-1 to unload its junk-bond portfolio by continuing to sell off the bonds...
example.arg: by continuing to sell off the bonds

roleset.name: cause to be unburdened
roleset.note: UNLOAD-V NOTES: Actually, I don't think this construction would occur with instrument. VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls wipe_manner-10.4.1. No comparison. (from unload.02-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: John unloaded the delicate china from the truck with a forklift.

example.name: all args, different order
example.text: John unloaded the truck of the delicate china with a forklift.
